5187.verse: فَإِذَا|Then when|93|101|1730$قُضِيَتِ|is concluded|102|118|16929$ٱلصَّلَوٲةُ|the prayer,|94|110|16930$فَٱنتَشِرُواْ|then disperse|109|125|14121$فِى|in|48|64|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the land|92|108|100$وَٱبْتَغُواْ|and seek|91|99|1637$مِن|from|50|64|53$فَضْلِ ٱللَّهِ|(the) Bounty of Allah,|164|193|16931$وَٱذْكُرُواْ|and remember|113|142|633$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|82|184$كَثِيرًا|much|72|101|275$لَّعَلَّكُمْ|so that you may|129|143|193$تُفْلِحُونَ|succeed.|91|91|1677$

5189.verse: إِذَا|When|57|76|1370$جَآءَكَ|come to you|103|140|1118$ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقُونَ|the hypocrites,|121|158|7309$قَالُواْ|they say,|83|120|101$نَشْهَدُ|`We testify|97|134|16936$إِنَّكَ|that you|77|96|340$لَرَسُولُ|(are) surely (the) Messenger|211|236|16937$ٱللَّهِ‌ۗ|(of) Allah.`|94|144|606$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|131|167$يَعْلَمُ|knows|61|111|742$إِنَّكَ|that you|77|102|340$لَرَسُولُهُۥ|(are) surely His Messenger,|201|227|16938$وَٱللَّهُ|and Allah|80|132|167$يَشْهَدُ|testifies|73|125|4656$إِنَّ|that|48|100|58$ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ|the hypocrites|116|142|4122$لَكَـٰذِبُونَ|(are) surely liars.|133|133|5518$

5191.verse: ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|71|28$بِأَنَّهُمْ|(is) because|102|115|607$ءَامَنُواْ|they believed,|114|127|84$ثُمَّ|then|50|63|293$كَفَرُواْ|they disbelieved;|133|146|59$فَطُبِعَ|so were sealed|119|132|16939$عَلَىٰ|[upon]|64|71|52$قُلُوبِهِمْ|their hearts,|102|158|66$فَهُمْ|so they|70|183|152$لَا|(do) not|75|188|30$يَفْقَهُونَ|understand.|99|156|4223$

5192.verse: ۞ وَإِذَا|And when|103|118|96$رَأَيْتَهُمْ|you see them|110|141|11589$تُعْجِبُكَ|pleases you|98|129|16940$أَجْسَامُهُمْ‌ۖ|their bodies,|105|136|16941$وَإِن|and if|58|89|213$يَقُولُواْ|they speak,|98|113|4219$تَسْمَعْ|you listen|84|90|16942$لِقَوْلِهِمْ‌ۖ|to their speech,|126|139|16943$كَأَنَّهُمْ|as if they (were)|132|145|944$خُشُبٌ|pieces of wood|120|133|16944$مُّسَنَّدَةٌ‌ۖ|propped up.|99|112|16945$يَحْسَبُونَ|They think|101|107|11045$كُلَّ|every|57|68|2487$صَيْحَةٍ|shout|84|106|16946$عَلَيْهِمْ‌ۚ|(is) against them.|138|160|22$هُمُ|They|53|75|56$ٱلْعَدُوُّ|(are) the enemy,|133|155|16947$فَٱحْذَرْهُمْ‌ۚ|so beware of them.|149|160|16948$قَـٰتَلَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ‌ۖ|May Allah destroy them!|181|259|7528$أَنَّىٰ|How|54|210|1961$يُؤْفَكُونَ|are they deluded?|139|217|5164$

5186.verse: O you who have believed, when [the adhan] is called for the prayer on the day of Jumu'ah [Friday], then proceed to the remembrance of Allah and leave trade. That is better for you, if you only knew.

5187.verse: And when the prayer has been concluded, disperse within the land and seek from the bounty of Allah, and remember Allah often that you may succeed.

5188.verse: But when they saw a transaction or a diversion, [O Muhammad], they rushed to it and left you standing. Say, "What is with Allah is better than diversion and than a transaction, and Allah is the best of providers."

5189.verse: When the hypocrites come to you, [O Muhammad], they say, "We testify that you are the Messenger of Allah." And Allah knows that you are His Messenger, and Allah testifies that the hypocrites are liars.

5190.verse: They have taken their oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah. Indeed, it was evil that they were doing.

5191.verse: That is because they believed, and then they disbelieved; so their hearts were sealed over, and they do not understand.

5192.verse: And when you see them, their forms please you, and if they speak, you listen to their speech. [They are] as if they were pieces of wood propped up - they think that every shout is against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May Allah destroy them; how are they deluded?
